'''''When You Say Nothing at All''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to use [[elemental reaction]]s to destroy the three Elemental Rings  &mdash; {{Hydro}}, {{Pyro}}, {{Electro}}, or {{Cryo}} &mdash; made by the [[Iniquitous Baptist]].

==Trivia==
* This achievement's name is likely a reference to the 1988 country song, ''{{w|When You Say Nothing at All}}''.
* The Chinese name is a line from the poem ''{{W|Pipa xing}}'' by Chinese poet {{w|Bai Juyi}}.
* The Indonesian name is a reference to the lyrics {{id|"30 menit kita disini tanpa suara"}} in [https://youtu.be/ai3I1K_JvlU ''Pelangi Di Matamu''], a song by {{w|Jamrud_(band)|Jamrud}}.
